text: Motion
CM
Student Council President
Motion
Motion
Motion

Oni-Gokko Variety Show "Shutatata!"
Next guest is!

Under the clear blue sky, shining high school idol,
Illumination Stars──!

The stage is set at a prefectural high school surrounded
by abundant nature. We'll be visiting their school festival.

Can Illumination Stars continue to
evade Oni until the after-party!?

N-Nice to meet you!
I'm Mano Sakuragi from Illumination Stars.
I'm Hiori Kazano.

I'm Meguru Hachimiya!
Nice to meet you all!

Nice to meet you!
We're really happy to have everyone here!

Before we start shooting, let us guide you around the school.
This way, please!
Wow／Amazing／Wow!

Every class booth looks so fun!
And the decorations are incredible...!

Hehe... Our school is small, but we put
a lot of effort into the school festival every year.

This year, it was chosen as the location for the program...
And Illumination Stars graciously agreed to come.
It's going to be the best school festival for sure.

Well then, let's do our best as the guests!
To ensure the success of the school festival...

Yeah, that's right...
Let's give it our all together!

All right! Let's pump ourselves up together! Even the
student council president! Let's put our hands together... Mano!

Yeah, Meguru-chan!
──Here we go...!
──Let's deliver our radiance to everyone!
Illumination Stars!!"
